05a1be153d535c7cb2395044eb9336d7 (07:32): If making a portfolio/resume website, which is the best top level domain to go with? xxxxxx.me, xxxxxxx.info, ect?
73e85fb1da259f035e33ef149df273d7 (07:33): i like the .me's but to each his own
73e85fb1da259f035e33ef149df273d7 (07:33): whichever you want
73e85fb1da259f035e33ef149df273d7 (07:34): mine's .net
2f94ae437a02a23fc87c1bff33a4de68 (07:34): whatever you can get, A lot of domains are gone so best be flexible.
33efc1e92757da55a29793522ce54302 (07:34): try for .com, .net if possible, otherwise I would say .me

0de37da1d654c10aed33d7b7347b8e3b (07:40): portfolio for what. business purpose? why not go for a .com? personal stuff that bears no strict professional relevance? doesn't really matter then. *.me is nice, but if someone judges you on you tld, something is seriously wrong >_>
